Job Description: Java Developer - SpringHibernate Frameworks     Job Requirements : - Only B.EB-Tech from Tier 12 college with CGPA 7 or above - Working experience in product companies.  - Master of Java, server side programming and cloud appplications  - Developing, optimizing, and deploying scalable, highly performant server-side applications  - Building large scale cloudAPI customer-facing and in-production  - Spring framework, server-side programming, cloud applications  - Developing large scale cloudAPI services, distributed systems, databases (SQL and NoSQL), Java web app threading model, REST, HTTP, OAuth2, and multi-layered security  - Developing web application servers (Tomcat, Glassfish, JBoss), Spring, JPA, and Hibernate  - HTTPS and SSL certificates and its implications for building a secure architecture.  - Experience in OO, DI, IoC design patterns
